name: Ventas Diarias
query:
select a.creation as 'Fecha::100', 
a.name as 'Folio:Link/Sales Invoice:100', 
a.clave as 'Clave Cliente::100', 
a.customer as 'Nombre Cliente:Link/Customer:200', 
case when a.name LIKE '%%TICKET%%' THEN a.grand_total / 1.16 else a.total end as 'Sub Total:Currency:100', 
(a.grand_total) - (case when a.name LIKE '%%TICKET%%' THEN a.grand_total / 1.16 else a.total end) as  'IVA:Currency:100', 
a.grand_total as 'Total:Currency:100',
case when a.docstatus = '1' then 'Activo' when a.docstatus = '2' then 'Cancelado' when a.docstatus = '0' then 'Borrador' else a.docstatus end as 'Estado::100',
a.cfdi_status as "Estado CFDI",
a.currency as 'Moneda::100',
a.forma_de_pago as "Forma de Pago", 
b.customer_type as "Tipo de Cliente"
from `tabSales Invoice` a left join  `tabCustomer` b on a.customer=b.name
where a.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and a.posting_date <= %(to_date)s and a.name not like '%%DEVOLUCIÓN%%'
